name: Raf R's Abstract Art Machine
description:
a unique one screen art program that draws art how you tell it to. part 4 of my art machines series.

S to hide and show all sliders. Z to generate and X to load seeds, C to clear seeds list, SPACE to render high quality and SPACE to return to main screen.

"cool seeds" text file included in download

ps. this program along with art machines uploaded to this site very closely to each other were programmed at the same time but uploaded months after since I was busy working on school and new games.
